grith.jgrith.vomsProxy
Class VomsProxy

java.lang.Object
  grith.jgrith.vomsProxy.VomsProxy

public class VomsProxy
extends Object

A VomsProxy is a wrapper for a GlobusCredential that has got a voms attribute certificate attached to it. This class also provides all the methods to easily create such a proxy in Java. Internally this class uses a GlobusCredential as a kind of "base" credential which will be created prior to getting the voms attribute certificate. This "base" proxy is used to contact the voms server which in turn will issue the attribute certificate for the group the user requested (if he is a member, that is). The magic happens in the classes VomsProxyCredential and VOMSAttributeCertificate. At the moment you only can specify the (sub-)group you want the proxy to have information included. If we should need more detailed information in the proxy I'll change this so that you can specify the command to the voms server directly.

Author:
Markus Binsteiner

VomsProxy

public VomsProxy(File proxyFile)
          throws Exception
Creates a VomsProxy by parsing a file that contains a voms-enabled X509 proxy.

Parameters:
proxyFile - the proxy file
Throws:
NoVomsProxyException - if the proxy is not a voms proxy
Exception

VomsProxy

public VomsProxy(org.globus.gsi.GlobusCredential credential)
          throws Exception
Throws:
Exception

VomsProxy

public VomsProxy(VO vo,
                 String group,
                 char[] passphrase,
                 long lifetime_in_ms)
          throws Exception
This creates a VomsProxy using usercert.pem and userkey.pem in the default globus location to create a intermediate proxy that is used to attach the voms attribute certificate to. You have to provide the passphrase of the private key.

Parameters:
vo - the vo you want to have the proxy for
group - the group you want to have the proxy for (example: /APACGrid/NGAdmin)
passphrase - the passphrase of the private key
lifetime_in_ms - the lifetime of the proxy (and the voms attribute certificate) in milliseconds
Throws:
Exception

VomsProxy

public VomsProxy(VO vo,
                 String group,
                 org.globus.gsi.GlobusCredential baseProxy,
                 long lifetime_in_ms)
          throws Exception
Creates a VomsProxy using the GlobusCredential you provide. The constructor tries to contact the voms server and get an attribute certificate for the requested VO/group and then attaches this attribute certificate to the GlobusCredential. Use getVomsProxyCredential() to get the actual voms proxy.

Parameters:
vo - the VO you want the proxy forprivate
group - the (sub-)group within the VO you want the proxy for (example: /APACGrid/NGAdmin)
baseProxy - a valid GlobusCredential (with the appropriate dn the voms server has in it's database)
lifetime_in_ms - the lifetime of the proxy (and the voms attribute certificate) in milliseconds
Throws:
Exception - if somethings gone wrong
Method Detail

init

public static GSSCredential init(VO vo,
                                 String group,
                                 char[] passphrase,
                                 int lifetime_in_hours)
                          throws Exception
This one creates a voms proxy with the requested vo information and returns it as GSSCredential. It's a convenience method so you don't have to create a VomsProxy wrapper object if you don't need to.

Parameters:
vo - the vo you want to have the proxy for
group - the group you want to have the proxy for (example: /APACGrid/NGAdmin)
passphrase - the passphrase of your local private key
lifetime_in_hours - how long the proxy should be valid
Throws:
Exception - if something went wrong

isVomsProxy

public static boolean isVomsProxy(org.globus.gsi.GlobusCredential cred)

getDefaultFqan

public String getDefaultFqan(boolean fullString)
Returns the default fqan of this voms proxy.

Parameters:
fullString - whether you want the full String or only VO and group
Returns:
the default fqan or null if it couldn't be established.

getVomsInfo

public ArrayList<String> getVomsInfo()
Retrieves information from the VOMSAttributeCertificate

Returns:
output similar to the commandline voms-proxy-info

getVomsProxyCredential

public org.globus.gsi.GlobusCredential getVomsProxyCredential()
If not null, this one returns the actual voms proxy credential

Returns:
the GlobusCredential with the attached voms attribute certificate or null if something went wrong during creation
